GoolagScanner::RequestBuilder

GoolagScanner::RequestBuilder Class Reference

Intense of this class is simply the concatenation of strings, respecting Uri encoding, uses a ScanProvider to build up a valid Url. More...

IScanProvider scanprovider

Detailed Description

Intense of this class is simply the concatenation of strings, respecting Uri encoding, uses a ScanProvider to build up a valid Url.

string GoolagScanner::RequestBuilder::StripSite ( string  dorkquery  )  [inline, protected]

If we got a Dork which itself tries to omit some page, well, we remove this command.

Returns:
